name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of creative writing. Topics include characterization, plot development, narrative techniques, and finding a unique voice.

name: Poetry Writing I
description: This course is an introduction to the basics of writing poetry. Students will explore different poetic forms, such as haiku, sonnets, and odes, and techniques for creating successful poems.

name: Poetry Writing II
description: This course builds on the fundamentals of poetry writing covered in the first course. Students will explore more advanced poetic forms and techniques, such as rhyme, meter, and sound.

name: Poetry Writing III
description: This advanced course covers the history of poetry and the various schools of thought and poetic conventions. Students will also be introduced to various poetic styles and write their own poems.
